name: Floppy Heroes
description: Floppy Heroes is a ragdoll physics brawler with dismemberment, a wide range of weapons and armor, very simple controls, and custom battles playable with up to 6 local players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
